directions: Combine jicama, orange chunks, red bell pepper, cucumber, sweet yellow and orange peppers, radishes, Thai chile peppers, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, lemon juice, and black pepper in a large bowl.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 navel oranges, peeled and cut into chunks
1 large red bell pepper, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Refreshing Sweet and Spicy Jicama Salad (Vegan)
